content.refrain: Onye chi ya mekara kene ya O O chim imena
gosigom ebere gi Nna, anuri bu nke mo.
Eeekene o chim imena, o-tito diri gi e imena
Ekene kam n'enye Gi imena, otito diri Gi Nna, imena
verses:
Anam ekene Chineke mo, oh- chim imena
Anam ekene Eze, Eze kacha Eze nile
Mgbe ino na nsogbu, kpokuo Chukwu
Chukwu nke nazo anyi, Chineke bu Chi nke
Chi nke nazo ndi nke ya e
Oka nma itukwasi Chukwu obi
Chukwu nke anyi di ndu
karia itukwasi onye, onye amara aha ya obi.
Chineke nara onyinye, ekene nke juputara obi
anam echeta ha bu iheoma nke iji neso m.
